strategy_reasoning: We're turning dry technical updates (workflows, documentation, bug fixes) into a cozy narrative about tending a digital garden. The pixel art style aligns with the 'indie dev/builder' nostalgia, making the platform feel welcoming and organized rather than corporate and sterile. The 'random seed' fix is visualized as magical variety, and the workflow updates as tidy organization.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit robot gardener organizing crates labeled 'PR' and 'ISSUES' into neat stacks. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Like Stardew Valley inventory management but cute. Emotionally warm, nostalgic. Text in pixel font: 'TIDY WORKFLOW'.
images.description: Visualizing the new automated workflow for organizing issues and PRs as a tidy garden task.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art close-up of a magical seed packet labeled 'SEED -1'. It is glowing and sprouting three completely different colorful pixel flowers (blue, pink, yellow) simultaneously. Soft pastel background with sparkles. Retro game UI vibe. Lime green (#ecf874) accents. Represents randomness and creativity. Warm, inviting.
images.description: Illustrating the 'seed=-1' fix which now correctly generates random outputs, symbolized by diverse blooms.

images.prompt: A pixel art wooden notice board in a peaceful digital forest. Fresh papers pinned to it saying 'NEWS' and 'DOCS'. Sunlight streaming through pixelated trees. Soft lime green (#ecf874) grass. Cozy vibes like A Short Hike. Wholesome and informative.
images.description: Announcing the README news updates and regenerated API docs in a village RPG style.

alt_text: A series of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1) A cute robot organizing crates in a garden. 2) A magical seed packet sprouting different flowers representing random AI generation. 3) A wooden bulletin board in a pixel forest showing latest news updates. All featuring soft lime green and pastel colors.
